AoS - Idoneth Deepkin 2000pts - The Sárcorraíl Warshoal (Age of Sigmar) [1,985pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Idoneth Deepkin) [1,985pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Battle Regiment

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Unified, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Battle Regiment

      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

    • Leader [940pts]

      • Fury of the Deep Vents - Eidolon of Mathlann: Aspect of the Storm [330pts]

        Selections: Crulhook, Sharp Fangs, Spear of Repressed Fury, Stormshoal, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders

        Categories: EIDOLON, HERO, ORDER, ASPECT OF THE STORM, IDONETH DEEPKIN, AELF, Leader

        Unit: Eidolon of Mathlann: Aspect of the Storm, Unit Abilities: Crashing Upon the Foe, Drench with Hate, Fly, Pulled into the depths, Stormshoal, Weapon: Crulhook, Sharp Fangs, Spear of Repressed Fury

        • Arcane Tome

          Selections: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield

          Categories: Artefact

          Artefact: Arcane Tome, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Arcane Tome The bearer becomes a WIZARD that knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. If the bearer is already a Wizard, they can attempt to cast 1 additional spell instead.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Eidolon of Mathlann: Aspect of the Storm 1212103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crashing Upon the Foe You can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model after it makes a charge move.

        Add 1 to the Attacks and Damage characteristics of this model’s Spear of Repressed Fury if it made a charge move in the same turn.

        This model can retreat and still charge later in the same turn.
        Drench with Hate Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units that are wholly within 18" of any friendly models with this ability.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Pulled into the depths At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO with a Wounds characteristic of 8 or less that is within 3" of this model. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this model that target that HERO in that phase.
        Stormshoal Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Crulhook Melee1"43+2+-11
        Sharp Fangs Melee3"2D64+4+-1
        Spear of Repressed Fury Melee2"43+2+-22

      • Iarrsíul Diresurge - Isharann Soulscryer [140pts]

        Selections: Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Finger-claw, Scryfish Shoal

        Categories: HERO, ISHARANN, ORDER, PRIEST, SOULSCRYER, IDONETH DEEPKIN, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader

        Unit: Isharann Soulscryer, Unit Abilities: Finder of Ways, Seeker of Souls , Weapon: Finger-claw, Scryfish Shoal


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Isharann Soulscryer 6"576+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Finder of Ways Instead of setting up this unit on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is set up travelling the ethersea. If you do so, when you would set up another friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN unit, instead of setting up the unit, you can say that it is joining this model in the ethersea. Up to 2 units can join this model in this way. At the end of any of your movement phases, you can set up this model wholly within 6"of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9"from any enemy models; then set up any units that joined this model wholly within 6"of the edge of the battlefield, wholly within 12"of this model, and more than 9"from any enemy models.
        Seeker of Souls At the start of your charge phase, you can pick one enemy unit within 24"of this model that is visible to them. If you do so, you must add 3 to charge rolls for friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units that are within 12"of that unit. However, the first model to be moved from each unit that receives this modifier must finish their charge move within ½"of that unit or their charge will fail.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Finger-claw Melee1"33+4+-1
        Scryfish Shoal Missile18"85+5+-1

      • Sileath Flickershoal - Isharann Tidecaster [105pts]

        Selections: 6. Arcane Corrosion, Amulet of Destiny, Born From Agony, General - Isharann, Pelagic Staff, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: ISHARANN, ORDER, HERO, TIDECASTER, WIZARD, IDONETH DEEPKIN, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Command Abilities: Born From Agony, Magic: Isharann Tidecaster, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Arcane Corrosion, Mystic Shield, Riptide, Unit: Isharann Tidecaster, Unit Abilities: Spirit Guardians, The Wide Ethersea ( General), Weapon: Pelagic Staff


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Born From Agony Increase this general’sWounds characteristic by 2.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Isharann Tidecaster 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, and Riptide
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Arcane Corrosion 648"If successfully cast, pick the closest enemy unit within 48" of the caster and measure the distance between the caster and the unit. If the distance is up to 12", the target suffers 1 mortal wound If the distance is more than 12" and up to 24" it suffers 2 mortal wounds instead If the distance is more than 24" and up to 36" it suffers 3 mortal wounds instead If the distance is more than 36" and up to 48" it suffers 4 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Riptide 718"If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18"of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for that unit. In addition, at the start of your next hero phase the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Isharann Tidecaster 6"576+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Spirit Guardians The first wound allocated to this model each turn is negated.
        The Wide Ethersea ( General) If this model is the general of your army, at the start of the first battle round you can declare that the Tides of Death table will be reversed. If you do so, the Ebb Tide ability is used in the first battle round, the High Tide ability is used in the second battle round, the Flood Tide ability is used in the third battle round, and the Low Tide ability is used in the fourth battle round. Then the four Tides of Death steps are repeated in reverse order, starting with Ebb Tide.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Pelagic Staff Melee1"23+3+-D3

If the dice roll for a unit is less than or equal to the number of models in the unit, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Volturnos [260pts]

        Selections: Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Deepmare Mount, The Astra Solus

        Categories: HERO, ORDER, VOLTURNOS, AKHELIAN, IDONETH DEEPKIN, 9 or less wounds Leader, Leader

        Command Trait: Supreme Lord of Tides, Unit: Volturnos, Unit Abilities: Cealith, the High King’s Shield, Deepmare Horn, First Among Akhelians, Fly, The Astra Solus, The Crest of the High Kings, Weapon: Deepmare's Fanged Jaw and Talon's, Deepmare's Lashing Tails, The Astra Solus


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Supreme Lord of Tides You can use this command ability if a friendly Volturnos is on the battlefield and the High Tide ability from the Tides of Death table applies for the battle round. If you do so, pick up to 3 different friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units wholly within 18" of that friendly VOLTURNOS. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by those units until your next hero phase. Battletome: Idoneth Deepkin Errata, July 2021 p2
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Volturnos 14"883+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Cealith, the High King’s Shield You can roll a dice if this model is affected by a spell. If you do so, on a 3+ the spell has no effect on this model (other units will be affected by the spell normally).
        Deepmare Horn Roll a dice if this model ends a charge move within 1" of any enemy units. On a 2+, the nearest enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        First Among Akhelians Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for friendly AKHELIAN units while they are wholly within 18" of this model.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        The Astra Solus If a hit roll for the Astra Solus is 6+, that attack has a Rend characteristic of -5 instead of -1.
        The Crest of the High Kings Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly IDONETH DEEPKIN units while they are wholly within 18" of this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Deepmare's Fanged Jaw and Talon's Melee2"33+3+-11
        Deepmare's Lashing Tails Melee2"33+3+-2
        The Astra Solus Melee1"53+3+-1D3

        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Biovoltaic Blast Once per battle, at the start of a combat phase, you can say that this unit will unleash the biovoltaic energy stored in its voltspears. If you do so, roll 1 dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, pick an enemy unit within 3" of this unit. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. For each 6+, the unit that is picked suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Musician - Akhelian Guard You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit if it includes any musicians.
        Standard Bearer - Akhelian Guard You can re-roll battleshock tests for this unit if it includes any standard bearers
        Wave Riders This unit’s voltspears have a Rend characteristic of -2 and a Damage characteristic of 2 if this unit made a charge move earlier in the same turn.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Idoneth Deepkin

          Selections: Forgotten Nightmares, Fuethán, Gloomtide Shipwreck, Isharann Rituals, Tides of Death

          Categories: IDONETH DEEPKIN, FUETHAN, SCENERY, GLOOMTIDE SHIPWRECK

          Battalion Abilities: Fiercest of Creatures, Isharann Rituals, Predators of the Ethersea, Revel in Slaughter, Battle Trait: Forgotten Nightmares, Isharann Rituals: Ritual of Erosion, Ritual of Rousing, Ritual of the Tempest, Tides of Death: -, 1. Low Tide, 2. Flooding Tide, 3. High Tide, 4. Ebbing Tide, Unit Abilities: Defensible, Set-Up


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Fiercest of Creatures In the combat phase, re-roll wound rolls of 1 for Fuethán mounts.
        Isharann Rituals ISHARANN HEROES from an Idoneth Deepkin army can perform the following Isharann rituals in your hero phase. A maximum of one Isharann ritual can be performed in each hero phase. In order to perform a ritual, at the start of your hero phase, say which ritual is being performed and then pick one ISHARANN HERO from your army that is more than 9" from any enemy models. Then roll 2D6. Add 1 to the roll if the HERO performing the ritual is within 1" of a Gloomtide Shipwreck, and add a further 1 to the roll if they are a PRIEST. In addition, add 1 to the roll for each other friendly ISHARANN HERO that is within 3" of the model performing the ritual (add 2 instead for each HERO within 3" that is a PRIEST). On a 10+ the ritual is successfully performed. On any other result, the ritual fails and nothing happens.
        Predators of the Ethersea At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this faction terrain feature. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead. This ability has no effect on IDONETH DEEPKIN units. Battletome: Idoneth Deepkin Errata, July 2021 p2
        Revel in Slaughter You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for Fuethán units that are affected by the Flood Tide ability from the Tides of Death table (pg 86). In addition, whenever a Fuethán unit would be affected by the Ebb Tide ability from the Tides of Death table, they are instead affected by the Flood Tide ability from the same table.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Forgotten Nightmares Missile weapons can only be used to target an Idoneth Deepkin with this battle trait if it is the closest visible enemy unit
        Isharann Rituals Effect Ref
        Ritual of Erosion Until your next hero phase, enemy units do not receive any benefit for being in cover.
        Ritual of Rousing Heal 1 wound allocated to each friendly EIDOLON on the battlefield. In addition, you can re-roll failed hit rolls and casting rolls for friendly EIDOLONS until your next hero phase.
        Ritual of the Tempest Until your next hero phase, enemy models cannot fly.
        Tides of Death TurnEffect Ref
        - IDONETH DEEPKIN units with this battle trait have a different Tides of Death ability each battle round, as shown on the Tides of Death table below.
        1. Low Tide 1/5In this battle round, all units with the Tides of Death battle trait are treated as being in cover
        2. Flooding Tide 2/6In this battle round, all units with the Tides of Death battle trait that run can still either shoot or charge in the same turn (but not both).
        3. High Tide 3/7In this battle round, the strike-first effect applies to units with the Tides of Death battle trait. Battletome: Idoneth Deepkin Errata, July 2021 p1
        4. Ebbing Tide 4/8In this battle round, all units with the Tides of Death battle trait that retreat can still either shoot or charge in the same turn (but not both).
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Defensible If this terrain feature was set up as a small Gloomtide Shipwreck, it is a defensible terrain feature that can be garrisoned by up to 5 IDONETH DEEPKIN models with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or less that do not have mounts.

        If this terrain feature was set up as a large Gloomtide Shipwreck, it is a defensible terrain feature that can be garrisoned by up to 10 IDONETH DEEPKIN models with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or less that do not have mounts.        		 Battletome: Idoneth Deepkin Errata, July 2021 p2
        Set-Up After territories are determined, you can set up this faction terrain feature wholly within your territory and more than 3" from all
        objectives and other terrain features. If both players can set up faction terrain features at the same time, they must roll off and the winner chooses who sets up their faction terrain features first.

        This faction terrain feature consists of 2 scenery pieces. When you set it up, you can set up the 2 scenery pieces touching, or you can set them up more than 3" from each other. If you set them up touching, they form 1 large Gloomtide Shipwreck. If you set them up more than 3" from each other, they form 2 small Gloomtide Shipwrecks that are separate faction terrain features.        		 Battletome: Idoneth Deepkin Errata, July 2021 p2

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Predator's Domain

        Categories: Game Options

        Grand Strategy: Predator's Domain


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Predator's Domain When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if you control more terrain features than your opponent.

      • Triumphs

        Selections: Bloodthirsty

        Categories: Game Options, Triumph

        Triumph: Bloodthirsty


        Triumph Description Ref
        Bloodthirsty Once per battle, after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit, you can say that it is bloodthirsty. If you do so, you can re-roll that charge roll.
